title: The Underdeeps of Moria (1R200)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (3) to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a [Moria] Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.
Lore:	”'I am afraid Balin is buried deep, and maybe something else is buried there too.'”
Rarity:	R
